article.headline: Gardner-Webb 81, Lipscomb 73
article.story: BOILING SPRINGS, N.C. (AP) -- Takavo Siddle scored 16 points and Gardner-Webb snapped Lipscomb's three-game winning streak by beating the Bisons 81-73 on Saturday night. Grayson Flittner had 15 points and Nate Blank added 14 for the Runnin' Bulldogs (7-9, 1-1 Atlantic Sun), who bounced back from a loss to Belmont by shooting 46 percent and hitting 10 of their 25 attempts from 3-point range. Matt French had 13 points and Thomas Sanders added 10 points for Gardner-Webb, which had 45 rebounds to Lipscomb's 42. Adnan Hodzic had 14 points and 10 rebounds for Lipscomb (7-9, 1-1), which committed just nine turnovers but was just 4-of-17 from beyond the arc. LaKory Daniels had 13, Eddie Ard scored 12 and Brandon Brown finished with 10. Gardner-Webb entered having lost five of six.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
